markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Trackless](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2304)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to footwear

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Trackless runes_ are common among hunters and trappers, as well as thieves and anyone fleeing pursuit. While wearing trackless footwear, you are continuously affected by the [_vanishing tracks_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1737) spell.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Trackless
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Trackless (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The rune has an activation.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You extend the effect of your rune out to a 20-foot emanation. The emanation remains for 8 hours, affecting up to 10 creatures of your choice within the area. You can Dismiss this effect.
name: Trackless (Greater)
